TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlAnchor extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class HtmlAnchor Inherits HtmlContainerControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler
type HtmlAnchor = class inherit HtmlContainerControl interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类有两种方法 。There are two ways to use the class. 第一种是用于导航：使用 属性定义要链接到的页面的位置。The first is for navigation: using the property to define the location of the page to link to. 第二种方法用于回发事件：使用 事件以编程方式处理用户单击链接的操作。The second is for postback events: using the event to programmatically handle the user's clicking a link. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e5a8xz39(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e5a8xz39(v=vs.100)). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件在单击控件时显示一条消息 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchor/CS/htmlanchorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchor/VB/htmlanchorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 时执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在单击控件时将执行页验证 。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 使用属性单击控件时，可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证 。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要防止执行验证，请将 属性设置为 false。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to false.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the link specified in the server control.
The URL target of the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定单击控件时链接到的 URL 。Use this property to specify the URL to link to when the control is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定在单击控件时要导航到的网页 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a Web page to navigate to when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 服务器控件中定义的书签名。

span.span: Gets or sets the bookmark name defined in the server control.
The bookmark name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以在网页上使用名称标记一个节。Use this property to mark a section on a Web page with a name. 这允许你从同一页面上的任何位置链接到此部分。This allows you to link to this section from anywhere on the same page. 例如，可以在页面顶部提供一个目录，该目录将直接链接到页面上的主题。For example, you can provide a table of contents at the top of a page that will link directly to topics on the page. 若要链接到标记的部分，请使用 属性设置为部分名称的控件，其前面带有 # 符号 (\) 。To link to a marked section, use an control with the property set to the name of the section, preceded by a # symbol (\). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在网页上标记不同部分，并从目录中链接到它们。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to mark different sections on the Web page, and link to them from a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使你可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击该控件时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此服务器事件会导致从客户端到服务器的往返过程。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式为事件指定和编写事件处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 单击该 控件时，将显示一条消息。When the control is clicked, a message is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例修改了前面的示例，以编程方式指定事件的事件处理程序并对其进行编码 。The following code example modifies the preceding example to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClick/CS/htmlanchorserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClick/VB/htmlanchorserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

[!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例修改了前面的示例，以编程方式指定事件的事件处理程序并对其进行编码 。The following code example modifies the previous example to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. summary.span: 获取或设置当单击 控件时，显示所链接到的网页的内容的浏览器窗口或框架的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page that is linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 时，显示所链接到的网页的内容的浏览器窗口或框架。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the is clicked.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击控件时显示链接到的网页内容的目标窗口或框架 。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page that is linked to when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为 `target` 属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target` `a` XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `a` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果的呈现输出 必须符合 XHTML 1.1，请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be compliant with XHTML 1.1. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100)). > > 创建可访问的网页时，请避免使用 属性来面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228011(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228011(v=vs.100)). 值必须以 a 到 Z 范围内的字母开头 (不区分大小写的) ，但以下具有下划线开头的特殊值除外。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来显示在 新的 unframed 窗口中单击控件时导航到的页面。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the page that is navigated to when the control is clicked in a new, unframed window. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性来指定在 控件回发到服务器时，控件引发验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当属性的值设置为时，属性才有效果 `true` 。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为属性指定值，则 当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值，并且 属性设置为 `true` ，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
